titleInfo.title: 1) A. Foucher: Les bas-reliefs du stūpa de Sikri (1903); 2) A Tibetan-English-Dictionary with Sanskrit Synonyms, by Sarat Chandra Das (1902); 3) M.J.S. Speyer (...); 4) H. Oldenberg: Le Bouddha, sa vie, sa doctrine et sa communauté (1903); 5) Buddhism, an illustrated quaterly review 1/1 (1903); 6) A.J. Edmunds: Hymns of Faith (Dhammapada) (1902) / Buddhist and Christian Gospels (1902) / A Buddhist Genesis (1904); 7) T. Suzuki: The first buddhist council (1904).
